name: Crown [1] Blueprint
description: It makes people more sober with this crown, which has the magic to restore spirit power.

name: Crystal Arrow
description: Arrow made of crystals. Own the Str of water.

name: Crystal Blue
description: A small blue ore. It has water attribute and can be made into Mystic Frozen after extraction.

name: Crystal Bone
description: Bone crystals found in magical caverns. Emits a frigid aura.

name: Crystal Mirror
description: A mirror made of crystal is a must-have item for women wanting to dress up. It is more advanced than a mirror made of glass. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Crystal Pumps
description: The boots made from rare crystals, Exquisite and mysterious. The user will show extraordinary elegance.
effect: INT ＋5,[Wizardry Staff VIII] ＋ [Robe of Cast VIII] ＋ [Eye of Dullahan VIII] ＋ [Crystal Pumps IV]: －5% CT Variable, ＋3% M.Dmg, ＋3% Ignore MDef

name: Cultish Masque
description: The mask used by High Priest can be purchased from collectors.

name: Cultish Masque Blueprint
description: The mask used by High Priest can be purchased from collectors.

name: Cursed Lyre [1]
description: The Cursed Lyre can make the person who gets shot painful to death.
effect: Agi ＋5,[Cursed Lyre IV] ＋[Ranger Clothes IV]: improve the influence of Atk on Falcon's Atk

name: Cursed Lyre [2]
description: The Cursed Lyre can make the person who gets shot painful to death.
effect: Agi ＋5,[Cursed Lyre IV] ＋[Ranger Clothes IV]: improve the influence of Atk on Falcon's Atk

name: Cursed Ruby
description: Dark Glowing Gem. It has an extraordinary mysterious power. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Cute Bear
description: Cute Bear is a stuffed teddy bear for children to play with. It is often used to comfort sad children. Having a bear will bring you a warm sense of happiness. Designer: Watanabe
effect: All Attributes ＋1,Become a Scenery! Wear [Cute Bear] to become a Scenery yourself. Adventurers who take photo of it will unlock the event Scenery "Next Stop: Happiness"!
